mapper.select:
select `cust_warranty_cost`.`id`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`,`cust_warranty`.`pre_policy_no`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_code`,`cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`,`cust_warranty`.`account_uuid`,`cust_warranty`.`agent_id`,`cust_warranty`.`channel_id`,`cust_warranty`.`plan_id`,`cust_warranty`.`product_id`,`cust_warranty`.`start_time`,`cust_warranty`.`end_time`,`cust_warranty`.`ins_company_id`,`cust_warranty`.`count`,`cust_warranty`.`pay_category_id`,`cust_warranty`.`is_settlement`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_url`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_from`,`cust_warranty`.`type`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`,`cust_warranty`.`integral`,`cust_warranty`.`express_no`,`cust_warranty`.`express_company_name`,`cust_warranty`.`express_address`,`cust_warranty`.`express_province_code`,`cust_warranty`.`express_city_code`,`cust_warranty`.`express_county_code`,`cust_warranty`.`delivery_type`,`cust_warranty`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty`.`updated_at` from cust_warranty_cost LEFT JOIN cust_warranty ON cust_warranty.warranty_uuid=cust_warranty_cost.warranty_uuid
id<#{page.lastId}
id<=(select `cust_warranty_cost`.`id` from cust_warranty_cost LEFT JOIN cust_warranty ON cust_warranty.warranty_uuid=cust_warranty_cost.warranty_uuid where cust_warranty.account_uuid=#{account_uuid} AND cust_warranty.state = 1 AND cust_warranty.warranty_status = 1 AND cust_warranty_cost.phase= 1 AND (cust_warranty_cost.pay_status= 201 OR cust_warranty_cost.pay_status = 203 OR cust_warranty_cost.pay_status = 204) AND state=1
and `cust_warranty`.`warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
ORDER BY `cust_warranty_cost`.`id` DESC limit #{page.start},1 )
1=1
AND cust_warranty.account_uuid=#{account_uuid} AND cust_warranty.state = 1 AND cust_warranty.warranty_status = 1 AND cust_warranty_cost.phase= 1 AND (cust_warranty_cost.pay_status= 201 OR cust_warranty_cost.pay_status = 203 OR cust_warranty_cost.pay_status = 204) AND state=1
and `cust_warranty`.`warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
ORDER BY `cust_warranty_cost`.`id` DESC limit #{page.offset}

select COUNT(cust_warranty_cost.id) from cust_warranty_cost LEFT JOIN cust_warranty ON cust_warranty.warranty_uuid=cust_warranty_cost.warranty_uuid WHERE cust_warranty.account_uuid=#{account_uuid} AND cust_warranty.state = 1 AND cust_warranty.warranty_status = 1 AND cust_warranty_cost.phase= 1 AND (cust_warranty_cost.pay_status= 201 OR cust_warranty_cost.pay_status = 203 OR cust_warranty_cost.pay_status = 204) AND state=1
and `cust_warranty`.`warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")

select count(`cust_warranty_cost`.`id`) from cust_warranty_cost LEFT JOIN cust_warranty ON `cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid` LEFT JOIN cust_warranty_brokerage ON `cust_warranty_cost`.`id`=`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`cost_id` WHERE `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`!=1 AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`!=6 AND `cust_warranty`.`state`= 1 AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`<#{end_time} AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`>=#{start_time} AND `cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`=#{manager_uuid}
and cust_warranty.`warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")

select
from cust_warranty_cost where warranty_uuid=#{warranty_uuid} and phase = 1

select `cust_warranty_cost`.`id`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`manager_uuid`,`cost_id`,`channel_id`,`agent_id`,`warranty_money`,`ins_money`,`manager_money`,`channel_money`,`agent_money`,`warranty_rate`,`ins_rate`,`manager_rate`,`channel_rate`,`agent_rate`,`car_integral`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`updated_at` from cust_warranty_cost LEFT JOIN cust_warranty_brokerage ON `cust_warranty_cost`.`id`=`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`cost_id` WHERE `cust_warranty_cost`.`id`=#{id}

select `cust_warranty_cost`.`id` id,`cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid` warranty_uuid,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_time` pay_time,`cust_warranty_cost`.`phase` phase,`cust_warranty_cost`.`tax_money` tax_money,`cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time` actual_pay_time,`cust_warranty_cost`.`premium` premium, `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_way` pay_way,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_money` pay_money,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` pay_status,`cust_warranty_cost`.`created_at` created_at,`cust_warranty_cost`.`updated_at` updated_at,
`cust_warranty`.`id` warranty_id,`cust_warranty`.`pre_policy_no` pre_policy_no,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_code` warranty_code,`cust_warranty`.`account_uuid` account_uuid,`cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid` manager_uuid, `cust_warranty`.`agent_id` agent_id,`cust_warranty`.`channel_id` channel_id,`cust_warranty`.`plan_id` plan_id,`cust_warranty`.`product_id` product_id,`cust_warranty`.`start_time` warranty_start_time,`cust_warranty`.`end_time` warranty_end_time, `cust_warranty`.`ins_company_id` ins_company_id,`cust_warranty`.`count` warranty_count,`cust_warranty`.`pay_category_id` pay_category_id,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_url` warranty_url,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_from` warranty_from, `cust_warranty`.`type` warranty_type,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status` warranty_status,`cust_warranty`.`created_at` warranty_created_at,`cust_warranty`.`updated_at` warranty_updated_at,
`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`id` brokerage_id,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`warranty_money` warranty_money,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`ins_money` ins_money,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`manager_money` manager_money, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`channel_money` channel_money,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`agent_money` agent_money,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`warranty_rate` warranty_rate,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`ins_rate` ins_rate, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`manager_rate` manager_rate,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`channel_rate` channel_rate,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`agent_rate` agent_rate,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`car_integral` car_integral, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`created_at` brokerage_created_at,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`updated_at` brokerage_updated_at,
GROUP_CONCAT(`cust_warranty_person`.`name`) as person_name
from `cust_warranty_cost` LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty`.`ins_company_id`=#{ins_company_id} LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_brokerage` ON `cust_warranty_cost`.`id`=`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`cost_id` LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_person` ON `cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_person`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=2 AND `cust_warranty_person`.`record_end_time`=#{max_time}
`cust_warranty_cost`.`id`<#{page.lastId}
`cust_warranty_cost`.`id`<=(select `cust_warranty_cost`.`id` from cust_warranty_cost LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid` LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_brokerage` ON `cust_warranty_cost`.`id`=`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`cost_id` LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_person` ON `cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_person`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=2 AND `cust_warranty_person`.`record_end_time`=#{max_time} where `cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`=#{manager_uuid} AND `cust_warranty`.`state` = 1 AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status`= 206 AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`is_settlement`=0 AND (`cust_warranty_cost`.`bill_uuid` is NULL OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`bill_uuid`='')
and `cust_warranty`.`warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `cust_warranty_person`.`name` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and 1=1
and `cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`<=#{start_time} AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`>#{end_time}
and `cust_warranty`.`start_time`<=#{start_time} AND `cust_warranty`.`start_time`>#{end_time}
and 1=1
GROUP BY `cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`id`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_time`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`phase`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`tax_money`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`premium`, `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_way`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_money`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`updated_at`,
`cust_warranty`.`id`,`cust_warranty`.`pre_policy_no`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_code`,`cust_warranty`.`account_uuid`,`cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`, `cust_warranty`.`agent_id`,`cust_warranty`.`channel_id`,`cust_warranty`.`plan_id`,`cust_warranty`.`product_id`,`cust_warranty`.`start_time`,`cust_warranty`.`end_time`, `cust_warranty`.`ins_company_id`,`cust_warranty`.`count`,`cust_warranty`.`pay_category_id`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_url`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_from`, `cust_warranty`.`type`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`,`cust_warranty`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty`.`updated_at`,
`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`id`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`warranty_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`ins_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`manager_money`, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`channel_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`agent_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`warranty_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`ins_rate`, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`manager_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`channel_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`agent_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`car_integral`, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`updated_at` ORDER BY `cust_warranty_cost`.`id` DESC limit #{page.start},1 )
1=1
AND `cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`=#{manager_uuid} AND `cust_warranty`.`state` = 1 AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status`= 206 AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`is_settlement`=0 AND (`cust_warranty_cost`.`bill_uuid` is NULL OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`bill_uuid`='')
and `cust_warranty`.`warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `cust_warranty_person`.`name` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and 1=1
and `cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`<=#{start_time} AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`>#{end_time}
and `cust_warranty`.`start_time`<=#{start_time} AND `cust_warranty`.`start_time`>#{end_time}
and 1=1
GROUP BY `cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`id`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_time`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`phase`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`tax_money`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`premium`, `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_way`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_money`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty_cost`.`updated_at`,
`cust_warranty`.`id`,`cust_warranty`.`pre_policy_no`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_code`,`cust_warranty`.`account_uuid`,`cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`, `cust_warranty`.`agent_id`,`cust_warranty`.`channel_id`,`cust_warranty`.`plan_id`,`cust_warranty`.`product_id`,`cust_warranty`.`start_time`,`cust_warranty`.`end_time`, `cust_warranty`.`ins_company_id`,`cust_warranty`.`count`,`cust_warranty`.`pay_category_id`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_url`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_from`, `cust_warranty`.`type`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`,`cust_warranty`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty`.`updated_at`,
`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`id`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`warranty_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`ins_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`manager_money`, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`channel_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`agent_money`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`warranty_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`ins_rate`, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`manager_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`channel_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`agent_rate`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`car_integral`, `cust_warranty_brokerage`.`created_at`,`cust_warranty_brokerage`.`updated_at` ORDER BY `cust_warranty_cost`.`id` DESC limit #{page.offset}
